summary:
Summary:
- Age 10-14: Excelled in chess and math competitions, earning 2nd place at a math competition organized by the Hellenic Mathematical Society
- Age 15-18: Developed a passion for technology, becoming acquainted with Linux and learning to code by developing a Qt C++ GUI application accepted on the official Ubuntu repositories. Engaged in ethical hacking for learning purposes
- Age 19-24: Earned a Bachelor's degree in the School of Informatics at Aristotle University of Thessaloniki
- Age 25: Joined the team at CERTH (Centre for Research & Technology, Hellas) as a full-time data scientist
- Age 26-28: Pursued a Master's degree in Computer Science and Engineering at Eindhoven University of Technology

awards.title: 2nd at Hellenic Mathematical Society competition at Chania
awards.description:
2nd place at Chania, when i was in 6th grade of primary school (age 11-12).
I've also passed "EUCLID" phase of the competition, in both 1st and 2nd grade of lower secondary school (age 12-14).

projects.title: Wallch
projects.description:
This is my first project, in which i took my first steps of programming together with a friend, at the age of 15. The development was active from 2010 until 2015 and was stopped mainly because we didn't admire the code we've written while learning to program and also wanted to move to other projects.

It served as a wallpaper changer from images stored on the hard drive, but what made it popular to the Linux community, was some unique features, like the Live Earth Wallpaper and Wikipedia's Picture Of The Day. In order for those features to work, we had a Raspberry Pi powered on all the time and running scripts which were downloading, processing (merging live weather images, downsizing, etc...) and uploading the corresponding images 24/7.

With the help of an OMG! Ubuntu! article, Wallch has been translated to more than 7 languages!

Reviews:
Article in greek magazine "Linux Inside": www.linuxinsider.gr/magazine/linux-inside-6-parallilos-programmatismos
OMG! Ubuntu!: www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2011/08/wallch-wallpaper-changer-adds-unity-features
Web Upd8: www.webupd8.org/2014/06/wallch-use-wallpaper-clocks-live-earth.html
NoobsLab: www.noobslab.com/2016/05/wallch-4-wallpaper-manager-live-clock.html
Youtuber InfinitelyGalactic: www.youtube.com/watch?v=CnWsC4kIHn8

profile_positions.description:
Involved in two projects, both part of Horizon 2020 research:

AVENUE - Autonomous Vehicles to Evolve to a New Urban Experience
Building machine learning models to predict battery cycle life before capacity degradation

ACTIVAGE - ACTivating InnoVative IoT smart living environemnts for ageing well 
-Analysis of raw data from motion sensors.
-Test and validation of ACTIVAGE IoT Ecosystem Suite framework

Miscellaneous Tasks
Data collection and visualisation of COVID-19 cases in Greece
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist
